title: Soul Yatri – A Mental Health App
description: An app that combines journaling, meditation, and therapy tools to improve mental wellness.

title: TRN – The Research Network
description: A platform for Indian students and professors to connect and collaborate on research projects.

title: SkillSync – Local Skill Barter App
description: Barter-based platform where users exchange services like design for coding or cooking for guitar lessons.

title: FarmAI – Crop Suggestion Tool
description: AI-powered crop recommendation engine for Indian farmers based on soil and weather data.

title: NoteNest – Collaborative Notes for Students
description: Students can upload and co-edit classroom notes, tag topics, and upvote most helpful ones.

title: FitGenie – AI Workout Generator
description: Generates personalized home workouts using AI based on your fitness level and goal.

title: Sangrah – Digital Archive for Indian Culture
description: An app that archives folk songs, recipes, and regional stories from Indian households.

title: PetConnect – Lost Pet Finder App
description: Crowdsourced system for locating lost pets using geolocation and pet photo matching.
